description: Schema for lines in reports/validation/validate_range_*_days.jsonl. Derived from observed JSONL evidence.

range_run_id.description: UUID of the parent range validation run.

day_run_id.description: UUID of the day-level sub-run, or null (e.g. weekends).

expected_blocks.description: Expected number of blocks for this day.

ovc_blocks.description: Observed OVC block count, or null if not evaluated.

outcome_blocks.description: Observed outcome block count, or null if not evaluated.

mismatch_count.description: Number of mismatched blocks, or null if not evaluated.

reasons.description: Reason codes for the status determination.
